short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely encrypt and decrypt text using AES-256 encryption. Protect sensitive information with a custom PIN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text and quickly encrypt or decrypt it using a single pin securely and effortlessly. The code is opens source and uses AES 256 bit encryption.
